The Greater Chennai Corporation: GCC) issued a statement denying the claim and stating that it had not issued any advisory banning food markets.
GCC: s regional deputy commissioner, Alby John, refuted the claim on Twitter and urged people to refrain from forwarding unverified messages.
The Chief Minister of Tamil Nadu: K. Palaniswamy, announced a lockdown in the state but clarified that shops selling essential items like milk, vegetables, and groceries would continue to function.
